mafmt

7.1.0
  • Intro
Need help reading this?

Intro

Installable via npm install --save mafmt, it can also be used directly in the browser.

Download

The source is available for download from GitHub. Alternatively, you can install using npm:

$ npm install --save mafmt

You can then require() mafmt as normal:

const mafmt = require('mafmt')

In the Browser

Mafmt should work in any ES2015 environment out of the box.

Usage:

<script type="text/javascript" src="index.js"></script>

The portable versions of mafmt, including index.js and index.min.js, are included in the /dist folder. Mafmt can also be found on unpkg.com under

  • https://unpkg.com/mafmt/dist/index.min.js
  • https://unpkg.com/mafmt/dist/index.js
